entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as one of Harry's friends who follows him straight away.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the main character who lands sprawled next to Ron.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as one of Harry's friends who jumps and lands on his other side.

entities.name: plant thing
entities.description: The plant thing is described as a 'soft landing' that breaks the fall. It has snake-like tendrils that bind Ron and Harry's legs.

entities.name: dog
entities.description: A dog is mentioned in the background, barking loudly.

entities.name: school
entities.description: The school is mentioned as being above them, with Hermione saying 'We must be miles under the school'.

relationships.description: Hermione landed on Harry's other side.
The plant had started to twist snake-like tendrils around Ron's ankles.
The plant had already bound Harry's legs tightly in long creepers without his noticing.
Hermione leapt up and struggled towards a damp wall.
The plant had started to twist snake-like tendrils around Hermione's ankles.
